properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I believe in one God,
the Father Almighty,
maker of heaven
and earth,
of all things visible
and invisible.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I believe in one Lord
Jesus Christ,
the only begotten
Son of God,
born of the Father
before all ages,
God from God,
Light from Light,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
true God from true God,
begotten, not made,
consubstantial
with the father,
through him all things
were made.
For us men and
for our salvation,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
he came down
from heaven,
(All bow)
and by the Holy Spirit
was incarnate of the
Virgin Mary,
and became man.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
For our sake he was
crucified under
Pontius Pilate,
he suffered death and
was buried,
and rose again on
the third day,

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
in accordance with
the Scriptures.
He ascended into
heaven,
and is seated
at the right hand of
the Father.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
He will come again
in glory,
to judge the living
and the dead,
and his kingdom will
have no end.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
I believe in
the Holy Spirit,
the Lord, the giver of life,
who proceeds from
the Father and the Son,
who with the Father
and the Son is adored
and glorified,

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
who has spoken
through the Prophets.
I believe in one,
holy, catholic
and apostolic Church.
I confess one baptism
for the forgiveness
of sins,

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
and I look forward
to the resurrection
of the dead,
and the life of the
world to come.
Amen.
